dcterms:description: The Borrow dataset consists of 49,855 different loan requests in English, scraped from the r/Borrow subreddit. Each request has a binary label indicating if a loan is successful or not, with an average success rate of 48.5%. A subset of 5% was annotated for sentence-level labels indicating persuasive strategies.
dcterms:title: Borrow dataset
